Module com.simulator.hospital
Package com.simulator.hospital.view

Class CustomerView

java.lang.Object
com.simulator.hospital.view.CustomerView
public class CustomerView extends Object
The class is the mapping of the Customer class inside the model onto the view this class contain also the shape and color of the object it also have the position inside the view The view will use this class for animation render

  • Constructor Details

    • CustomerView

      public CustomerView(int id, double x, double y, String serviceUnitName)
      Constructs a new CustomerView object with the specified id, x and y coordinates, and service unit name.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier for the customer
      x - the x-coordinate of the customer's position
      y - the y-coordinate of the customer's position
      serviceUnitName - the name of the service unit the customer is associated with

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the customer, including their ID, position, and service unit name. If the service unit name is "arrival", it indicates the customer has arrived at the system. Otherwise, it indicates whether the customer is in the queue or at the service point.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string representation of the customer
